message: I tried to do a search to see if this has already been discussed but apparently search is global and not per-group so I couldn't see if it had already been suggested.  But anyway I think having an instant message capability to have private conversations with other members who are online would be a good feature.  And also being able to search a specific group :-)
So I scrolled through a few pages of old topics here and I see this has been suggested before.  So I guess this is just a +1 to that.
